p: The lipid profile analysis, hemoglobin (Hb), ALT and AST are given in Table 6. It was clear from the values that plant extract at 300 mg dose significantly improved the lipid profile of obese mice by modulating the TC, HDL and LDL values. The T. officinale extract at 300 mg dose improved the TC by attenuating the LDL level and this amelioration in TC was significantly different from HFD ( p < 0.05). The same dose also improved the Hb level of obese mice. The levels of ALT and AST were also lowered in animals having plant extract dose of 300 mg and ALT concentration was comparable to the values observed for orlistat-treated group ( p > 0.05).
